mapper.select: SELECT C.istudent,C.nm,D.major_name majorNm,A.attendance,A.midterm_examination minEx,A.final_examination finEx,A.total_score totalScore FROM lecture_student A INNER JOIN lecture_applly B ON B.ilecture=A.ilecture INNER JOIN student C ON C.istudent=A.istudent INNER JOIN major D ON D.imajor= C.imajor WHERE A.ilecture=#{ilecture}
